description: Create, destroy, or update accounts on SolidFire

username.description: Please ensure that the user has the adequate permissions. For more information, please read the official documentation U(https://goo.gl/ddJa4Q).

new_name.description: New name for the user account.

name.description: Unique username for this account. (May be 1 to 64 characters in length).

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the SolidFire cluster.

initiator_secret.description: CHAP secret to use for the initiator. Should be 12-16 characters long and impenetrable.

state.description: Whether the specified account should exist or not.

target_secret.description: CHAP secret to use for the target (mutual CHAP authentication).

account_id.description: The ID of the account to manage or update.
